specific_question: How many high-risk food products does Lee's Market currently track as of Q3 2024?
answer: Lee's Market tracks 250 high-risk food products as of Q3 2024, affecting 30% of inventory.
justification: Identifying high-risk food products informs FSMA 204 compliance and traceability efforts.
dr_question: How can Lee's Market leverage FSMA 204 regulations to enhance food safety and customer trust?
